entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon then 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle later this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 early this morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
